nodes.text: Dug cavaliers, also known as Dug soldiers, were a type of soldier of the Dugs that served the Dug Council during the Clone Wars on the planet Malastare. They rode insectomorphs into battle and used a type of electrostaff. Additionally, Dug soldiers used Dug debris loaders that served as artillery pieces. Dug cavaliers fought with the Galactic Republic during the Battle of Malastare.
